snippet: After his uncle pressured him to work for Signal Oil, Mr. Shumway built the company into a successful conglomerate.
abstract: Forrest N Shumway, California businessman who built Signal Oil and Gas from a regional energy company into one of the nation’s largest conglomerates, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: After his uncle pressured him to work for Signal Oil, Mr. Shumway built the company into a successful conglomerate.

headline.seo: Forrest Shumway Dies at 85; Made a Conglomerate of Signal Oil
headline.main: Forrest Shumway, a White Knight of Deal Making, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline:
Forrest N. Shumway, 85,
White Knight Deal Maker
